mapper.update: UPDATE ai_agent SET agent_name = #{agentName}, channel = #{channel}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id as agent_id, GROUP_CONCAT(ac.client_id) as client_ids FROM ai_agent a JOIN ai_agent_client ac ON a.id = ac.agent_id WHERE a.status = 1 GROUP BY a.id
